name: Get_microsoft_graph_place_Item_As_microsoft_graph_room-ac92
description: Get the item of type microsoft.graph.place as microsoft.graph.room

$ul: **@odata.type** (default: #microsoft.graph.room)
**id**: The unique idenfier for an entity. Read-only.
**address**: The street address of the place.
**displayName**: The name associated with the place.
**geoCoordinates**: Specifies the place location in latitude, longitude and (optionally) altitude coordinates.
**phone**: The phone number of the place.
**audioDeviceName**: Specifies the name of the audio device in the room.
**bookingType**: Type of room. Possible values are standard, and reserved.
**building**: Specifies the building name or building number that the room is in.
**capacity**: Specifies the capacity of the room.
**displayDeviceName**: Specifies the name of the display device in the room.
**emailAddress**: Email address of the room.
**floorLabel**: Specifies a descriptive label for the floor, for example, P.
**floorNumber**: Specifies the floor number that the room is on.
**isWheelChairAccessible**: Specifies whether the room is wheelchair accessible.
**label**: Specifies a descriptive label for the room, for example, a number or name.
**nickname**: Specifies a nickname for the room, for example, 'conf room'.
**tags**: Specifies additional features of the room, for example, details like the type of view or furniture type.
**videoDeviceName**: Specifies the name of the video device in the room.
